name: tate
bio: Metabridge is a platform that connects entrepreneurs with respective investors to invest in the business.
Business or entrepreneur can create orders for seeking for investment and respective investors can see these orders.

Orders specify details about the business seeking for investment and what the intend to do with the investment and they also upload a documents of the business like business registrations documents and financial books.

Orders can be created for a new project or an existing project, when creating for a new project milestone are uploaded and other details are uploaded but for an existing project only funding details are collected from the business.
lore: Metabridge is a platform that connects entrepreneurs with respective investors to invest in the business.
Business or entrepreneur can create orders for seeking for investment and respective investors can see these orders.

Orders specify details about the business seeking for investment and what the intend to do with the investment and they also upload a documents of the business like business registrations documents and financial books.

Orders can be created for a new project or an existing project, when creating for a new project milestone are uploaded and other details are uploaded but for an existing project only funding details are collected from the business.

content.text: How do i create an order on metabridge?
You can create either for a new or existing project, for a new project milestones and other details are collected while for an existing project only funding details are collected
How can i invest in a business on metabridge?
You can search through the orders for different businesses and selects pool you want to invest in for a business and make your deposit
